title: Sony Pictures Names Louise Chater Executive VP International Research
text:
Sony Pictures Names Louise Chater Exe... Sony Pictures Names Louise Chater Executive VP International Research Next Story Prev Story 13 hrs ago Read more: Hollywood Reporter 
The hire was announced by Josh Greenstein, the film studio's president of worldwide marketing and distribution. Chater will oversee all international theatrical market research efforts for the studio, helping to shape and manage Sony's messaging across all labels for all films in territories and markets outside of North America.   Hollywood Reporter.
